RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MON PARADIS was well placed early, rallied on the turn three wide, drew clear late under firm handling. PRINCESS MORO was unhurried early, swung four wide in the stretch, closed fast and was gaining. LADY MECHANIC set the pace until mid stretch and gradually weakened. TALK DIRTY chased the speed for three quarters, then flattened out. PEACH BELLINI was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Mechanic
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the pace until mid stretch and gradually weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Mon Paradis
ENTRY.COMMENT: was well placed early, rallied on the turn three wide, drew

ENTRY.NAME: Talk Dirty
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the speed for three quarters, then flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Moro
ENTRY.COMMENT: was unhurried early, swung four wide in the stretch, closed fast,

ENTRY.NAME: Peach Bellini
ENTRY.COMMENT: was outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 9. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VALEROSO stalked the early pace, rallied at the quarter pole and drew even, drew off under firm handling to win as much the best. HOLY SAINT had good position early, rallied three wide in the stretch, was no match for the winner but was up for place. BOO BE RIGHT set the pace for a half and gradually weakened. PERCENTAGE tracked four wide and had no rally. NANO never far back, lacked a late response. THIS RACE WAS ORIGINALLY HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS ADDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOR THE BISCUIT pressed the early pace, rallied at the quarter pole and gained the lead, drew off in the stretch under a hand ride to win going away. WRITTEN CONSENT tracked four wide early, rallied in the stretch five wide, finished well and was second best. THETEASERGOTLOOSE raced close up throughout and went evenly late. SMARTY PANTS raced wide early, angled in stretch and was no threat late. DANZING CHICK was hustled along to make the lead and faded in the stretch. JACK'S YACHT QUEEN allowed to settle, failed to menace. SISTER CODE was outrun. THIS RACE WAS ORIGINALLY HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS ADDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Theteasergotloose
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced close up throughout and went evenly late

ENTRY.OWNER: Spadone Emil John and Stephenson Kate

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 9. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OVERBEARING dueled early while between horses, shook clear on the turn,remained well clear in the stretch while being ridden out. HIDDEN RULER was never far back, rallied in the stretch three wide and was up for place. HONOR LIFE dueled on the lead from the rail and weakened slightly. CALL WEST was allowed to settle early, raced four wide and went evenly late. YO BERBS saved ground, and was no threat. BIG TRIP dueled early three wide and was through after a half. THIS RACE WAS ORIGINALLY HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS ADDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 18400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STONE COLD CAT raced in the second flight four wide, rallied on the far turn with a quick move, drew off in the stretch under firm handling. PLATE IT UP had good position on the inside, finished willingly and was second best. SAMMY DA BULL was unhurried early, swung five wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. MONSTER HUNTER was unhurried early, improved late while no threat. JACK BE FAST dueled on the lead for three quarters, then weakened, in the stretch. NAMBITI dueled on the inside and tired in mid stretch. HEIDI'S SINATRA saved ground early, angled out in the stretch and was no threat. ONE CRAZY RIDE dueled on the lead three wide and tired on the far tun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 9. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GO STELLAIRE was unhurried early, angled out five wide in the stretch, closed fast and was along in time. GOLDEN LASSIE dueled early, gained a clear lead on the turn, held gamely in the stretch drive and just missed. AUNT STELLA was well placed on the inside, angled out in the stretch, finished well in a good effort. ONE SMART COOKIE had good position on the inside and went evenly late. PROUD MAID MARIAN allowed to settle, failed to menace. SWEET BELEN hopped start, contended three wide and tired in mid stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered F oals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE HONORABLE ONE raced three wide early, dropped to the rail down the backside and gained a slight lead, shook on the far turn and remained clear in the stretch under firm handling. BROADWAY SKY had good position throughout, rallied four wide in the stretch and was up for place. DAWN WEST was unhurried early and trailed, rallied in the stretch and finished well. TONKAWA SPRINGS tracked four wide and had a mild bid. MO HEAT had good position, on the inside and had no rally. SWELTER set the early pace and chased the winner around the far turn, weakened in the stretch. KENTUCKY MIST raced four wide and was no threat. TARAASHOQ was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 45. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAVALETTO had good position early, rallied in the stretch and drew even, drew off and lost whip late while widening. CONSTITUTION COAL dueled early, shook clear on the turn, was no match for winner late but was second best. MAN'S CHOICE raced mid pack and had a mild bid. MISS ELLIE pressed the pace on the inside and gradually weakened. OXBOW'S RIDE allowed to settle, failed to menace. BUCKEYE CHARLIE broke in air and was outrun. MOONLIGHT MEISTER was no factor. LEWIS AND CLARK raced wide and gave way after a half. TIMES CHANGED UPON REVIEW.
